game.title: Quest for the Light
game.synopsis: A young hero, Lily, embarks on a quest to defeat the Dark Overlord and save her realm from eternal darkness. With courage and the aid of loyal companions, she uncovers ancient artifacts and overcomes treacherous obstacles.
game.beginning: Lily learns about her destiny from a wise mentor and sets out, recruiting a diverse group of adventurers.
game.ending: After a climactic battle at the Overlord's fortress, Lily defeats him using the Sword of Light, restoring brightness to the kingdom and earning its gratitude.
